patthana22.36:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho saraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.36:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:3.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.36:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naaraṇañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana22.36:5.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.36:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:8.1: Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā sanidassanasappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … satta.
patthana22.36:10.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa
patthana22.36:10.1_1: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa
patthana22.36:10.1_2: araṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca
patthana22.36:10.1_3: naanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo ca dhammā anidassanaappaṭighassa araṇassa dhammassa
patthana22.36:11.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekavīsa, anantare tīṇi …pe… sahajāte nissaye
patthana22.36:11.1_1: ekavīsa, upanissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte ekavīsa
patthana22.36:12.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
